specific_query_list.query: Summarize the discussion about the marketing target of the remote control.
tokenized_answer: The preliminary aim of the profit was fifty million Euros.
The setting price was twenty-five Euros each remote control, and therefore the profit was twelve and a half Euros per item.
To reach the profit goal of fifty million, Marketing set a sales figure of four million.

specific_query_list.query: Why did Marketing disagree with Project Manager when Project Manager proposed the setting price?
tokenized_answer: The setting price of each remote control that Project Manager proposed was twenty-five, but Marketing had doubts about the profits.
Marketing wasn't sure that if the mark-up of fifty percent is normal for a product, and preferred sixty percent.

specific_query_list.query: Why did User Interface agree with Industrial Designer's opinion when discussing the adapted product of the remote control?
tokenized_answer: User Interface held the same opinion as Industrial Designer that different remote controls that were incompatible with each other brought inconvenience to users.
User Interface still presumed that this remote control was only for television.
